snippet: With the Taliban making gains in their insurgency and seizing control of territory from the government, opportunities for women in the Afghan work force have shrunk....

byline.original: By TAIMOOR SHAH and MUJIB MASHAL

lead_paragraph: With the Taliban making gains in their insurgency and seizing control of territory from the government, opportunities for women in the Afghan work force have shrunk.

headline.main: Gunmen in Afghanistan Kill 5 Female Airport Employees
